name: Exploding Knight Simulator 1
description:
Have you ever wondered what an exploding knight would do while he falls down a mountain? Well, fret not! This simulator game is for you!

With the most cinematic fire, amazing OST, and a valiant knight, the game boasts beautiful and realistic graphics along with rich color and immersive game play. While still in development, the game stands out with its great game play, performance, and graphics but with extra support from you, it can become a major hit.
